name: Rolling Milo
description:
Roll to overcome your cat's darkest fears!

Rolling Milo is a game developed for Retro Jam 22 made in 48 hours.

 ➤ Inspired by the Psychonauts saga, you decide to travel inside your cat's mind to understand why he is so fearful. 
Help the little Milo by going through the places he fears the most and swallowing everything you come across.

Features
  • 🙀 A gigantic cat ball.
  • 🌴 Three different levels filled with details.
  • 🏃 Fast-paced rolling arcade gameplay.  
  • 🕹️ Retro Style PS1 graphics.
Controls

Rolling Milo was made by Diogo Frazão, Rodrigo Fitas, Diogo Sousa, Isaac Pais and Ruben Sousa. It is played with a keyboard and gamepad.

  • Left and right arrows and Right JoyStick are used to rotate the player. 
  • The 'WASD' key and Left JoyStick is used to roll the cat.
